snippet: “Marisol: Sculptures and Works on Paper,” at El Museo del Barrio, is the artist’s first solo exhibition at a New York City museum.
abstract: Karen Rosenberg reviews exhibit of works by Maria Sol Escobar, who goes by name Marisol, at El Museo del Barrio.
lead_paragraph: “Marisol: Sculptures and Works on Paper,” at El Museo del Barrio, is the artist’s first solo exhibition at a New York City museum.

headline.seo: A Marisol Exhibition Opens at El Museo del Barrio
headline.main: At Home in a Wider World, Before It Was the Rage
headline.print_headline: At Home in a Wider World, Before It Was the Rage
